content:
The East Air Command was shot down in the sky above the Kharkiv region.

About this commandreportedinFacebook.

"In the Kharkiv region, one UAV of the enemy type Orlan-10 was destroyed,"-the message reads.

As reportedArmyinform, on the night of March 6, Russian occupation troops attacked Ukraine with rockets and shock drones like Shahd. The Air Force forces were shot down by 38 Shahanedov.
title: In the Kharkiv air defense, the reconnaissance drone of the Russians knocked down
description: The command reported this on Facebook. “One UAVs were destroyed in the Kharkiv region ...
author: Army Inform
